overview: Prior to joining mydeco.com, Nicole Vanderbilt was VP, International for Bebo where she ran international product, business development and marketing, as well as the viral invite process globally. Before Bebo, Nicole was at Google as Head of Industry Marketing for EMEA and, later, Head of Marketing for India. Nicole is thrilled to join the wild world of interiors and believes that dimmer switches are a great investment and that magnolia paint is a cop out.
